data.title: Telegram NGROK Bot
data.subTitle: Connect to remote pc in style.
data.excerpt: Developed a Telegram bot designed to facilitate easy access to the ngrok URL and port for establishing a remote connection to the university lab PC.

content.content: Developed a Telegram bot designed to facilitate easy access to the ngrok URL and port for establishing a remote connection to the university lab PC. Leveraged the capabilities of the free ngrok tunneling service to streamline the process and ensure seamless connectivity.
